name: SenseCAP LoRaWAN S2120 Weather Station
description: SenseCAP LoRaWAN S2120 Weather Station collects and uploads air temperature, humidity, wind speed/direction, rainfall intensity, light intensity, UV index, and barometric pressure data via worldwide LoRaWAN networks. Suitable for applications in gardens, agriculture, meteorology, and urban environmental monitoring, it ensures low maintenance costs with ultra-low power consumption and reliable performance. With Scan-and-Play simplicity and easy configuration via built-in Bluetooth, users can quickly start weather detection and benefit from OTA configuration and remote device management through the powerful SenseCAP Mate App.

specifications.title: Sensor Measurements
specifications.value: Air Temperature, Humidity, Wind Speed, Wind Direction, Rainfall Intensity, Light Intensity, UV Index, Barometric Pressure

specifications.title: Built-in Bluetooth
specifications.value: OTA configuration and remote device management

features: Bluetooth Configuration in 1 min & Remote Management
Ultra-low Power Consumption with Solar Panel & AA Batteries
Reliable Performance in Harsh Outdoor Environments
